Title: VIII.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (creator), Robert Levine (creator), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Robert Levine
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Silver gives Flint the last details of the schedule with the location of the ship. Eleanor's situation changes when the supply ships get sunk in the bay. Meanwhile with Mutiny rising up aboard the Walrus, Gates makes a vital decision.
